testcase.name: TC01 sayfada tc yapılabilmeli
testcase.system-out: Given Navigate to url "autoUrl".............................................passed Then Verify that home page is visible successfully..........................passed And Click on Products button................................................passed And Verify user is navigated to ALL PRODUCTS page successfully..............passed And Enter product name in search input and click search button..............passed And Verify SEARCHED PRODUCTS is visible.....................................passed And Verify all the products related to search are visible...................passed
